WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed issue and added test for this algorithm... with graphs of more than 1 connected component!
WorkItem.Description: Using debugger I realize that in ConnectedComponentsAlgorithm call InternalCompute() use DFS only for 1 (!) rootVertex i.e. the vertex passed to algorithm initialy. So that is why ComponentsCount is always 1. Algorithm traverses only one component of graph.
